qas.question: When did Nanjing become a state capital?
Who defeated Nanjing and took over in 280?

context: Nanjing first became a state capital in <a0_0>229 AD<a0_0/>, when the state of Eastern Wu founded by <a1_0>Sun Quan<a1_0/> <a2_0>during the Three Kingdoms period<a2_0/> relocated its capital to Jianye (建業), the city extended on the basis of Jinling Yi in <a4_0>211 AD<a4_0/>. Although conquered by <a3_0>the Western Jin dynasty<a3_0/> in 280, Nanjing and its neighbouring areas had been well cultivated and developed into one of the commercial, cultural and political centers of China during the rule of East Wu. This city would soon play a vital role in the following centuries.
